name: Darkside (itch) (hacked.design)
description:
The year 2064 is a heartless place. You gamble your life against the darkside neuralcombat gauntlet, for fame and money. Can you survive?

Made the the #7DFPS (and also #PROCJAM).

Game play

All you have to do is reach the end of each level. Killing is optional. Though recommended. Dying can be permanent.

Different weapons have different efficiencies.

Controls

Attack - Left Mouse Button

Melee - Right Mouse Button

Move - WASD, Numpad 8,2,4,6

Jump/Double Jump - Space, Uparrow

Dash - Ctrl

Next Weapon - Mouse scroll up

Prev Weapon - Mouse scroll down

Weapon * - Keys 1 - 8

Jam

Darkside was developed for the 7DFPS, with a enough procedural generation to let me submit it to PROCJAM too.
